# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
if c - (a - b) < 0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(c - (a - b))


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())  # a, b, c を取得

print(c - (a - b))  # 出力

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))

n, m = map(int, input().split())
for i in range(n):
    s = input()
    print(s)
    print(s)

for i in range(int(input())):
    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
    if b + c > a:
        print(b + c - a)
    else:
        print(0)

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
c = int(input())
print(c - (a - b) if c - (a - b) > 0 else 0)

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)


x, y, z = map(int, input().split())

print(z - (x - y))
